TabulaRasa.UpdateDef.content:
Version 2.0.8352 - Ancient Deconstruction: Fixed deconstructing Biotech buildings providing no resources, including the ancient exostrider.
- Penned Animals Config: New category in the options to control the number of days till a pennable animal wanders off (setting to 0 disables the pen functionality for that animal).
- Restore Defaults: Another new category for restoring the defaults of any other category, requires relaunching the game to complete the process as a safety since some things absolutely need to be done on startup.
